Blindside Assault.name: Blindside Assault
Blindside Assault.flavor: Your ally makes a sly sidelong attack, which opens up your foe to your surprise attack.
Blindside Assault.effect: Before the attack, you slide one ally 6 squares to a space adjacent to the target. The ally can then make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Commando Maneuver.name: Commando Maneuver
Commando Maneuver.flavor: You call on two allies to move watchfully into new positions.
Commando Maneuver.targets: One or two allies in the burst

Morale-Shaking Strike.name: Morale-Shaking Strike
Morale-Shaking Strike.flavor: Your attack causes your enemy to reel with indecision, which one of your allies can exploit.
Morale-Shaking Strike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target grants combat advantage to an ally of your choice.
